---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or improvement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: welcomemanish
---

## Summary
A clear and concise description of the feature you are requesting.

## Problem it Solves
What problem does this feature address? What is the current limitation?
(e.g. "When analysing large logs, I have no way to filter sessions by VLAN...")

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you imagine this working. What would the UI look like? What data would it use?

## Aruba CLI Reference (if applicable)
If this feature requires parsing additional output from the tech-support log, include the relevant `show` command and a sanitised example of its output.

```
show command name here

sanitised example output here
```

> ⚠️ Please do NOT paste real tech-support logs containing sensitive network data.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative approaches you considered, and why you prefer your proposed solution.

## Additional Context
Any other information, screenshots, or references that support this request.
